nodes.bodyText:
it is very hard to make decision, both is ok, lets keep on rcurly.
in example like:
    int[] a2 = new int[]
    {
        1,
        2,
        3
    }; // warn

it is defintely better to put violation on last item

but if look at examples at https://checkstyle.org/config_coding.html#ArrayTrailingComma_Description we put "ok" and "violatation" on last element !!! it is good point that we need to make violation on last element.
@wilcoln , please change main code to report violation on lest element
Please add // violation comments on lines with violation (for all violations in file)
